title: 2026 WGA Awards Nominations List
desc: The Writers Guild of America has revealed the nominees for the 2026 WGA Awards honoring the year's best writing across movies, TV, new media and more.

title: Philip Glass withdraws world premiere of his Lincoln symphony from Kennedy Center
desc: Composer says values of Trump-dominated Kennedy Center ‘are in direct conflict’ with symphony’s message

title: British Army officer dies after incident during live fire training
desc: The 25-year-old died on Sunday after the incident at an army training site in Northumberland.

title: Death from cancer less likely but ‘much to do’ to lower mortality rates
desc: Death from cancer in Scotland has become less likely in the last decade, according to new figures, but experts have warned there is “still much to do&rdqu...

title: US Central Command to conduct exercise amid Iran tensions
desc: Although CENTCOM said that the "exercise is designed to enhance asset and personnel dispersal capability," military parties have used such drills in the past as cover for launching a surprise attack.

title: Families of two men killed in Trump’s military boat strikes sue US government
desc: First-of-its kind suit filed by civil rights attorneys on behalf of families centers on 14 October strike in Caribbean Sea that killed six

title: Apple Expands Apple Watch Hypertension Notifications to Seven More Countries
desc: Apple today said that hypertension notifications are now available for Apple Watch and iPhone users in Australia, Malaysia, Colombia, Indonesia, South Korea, Brazil, and Turkey. Introduced last September, the hypertension detection feature uses the health sensors on the Apple Watch and custom-designed algorithms to determine if a user seems to be regularly experiencing high blood pressure.

title: Green MP Celia Wade-Brown to stand down at election
desc: The former Wellington mayor first entered Parliament in January 2024.

title: Doctors are ignoring new federal vaccine recommendations
desc: The American Academy of Pediatrics on Monday released its updated recommendations for what vaccines children should get.

title: Why aren't men in their 30s honest about what they want?
desc: Amy got in touch with Liveline to ask if anyone could tell her and her friends what men in their 30s want, as they've all had bad experiences with men not being upfront about their intentions around dating.
